class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/Waypoint Group
class.description: A panel allowing to group various points of interest into a waypoint group

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/Point of Interest
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new point of interest.

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/Point of Direction
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new point of direction.

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/Zone of Interest
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new zone of interest.

class.name: pal-waypoint_rviz_plugins/Virtual Obstacle
class.description: A tool that enables the addition of a new virtual obstacle.
